class_notes: This class is for DABSN Semester 1 students only. SESSION TWO: Mar. 14-May 6.
course_description: The course introduces a social responsibility framework as a model of professional nursing practice. Students will develop essential skills to provide compassionate, patient-centered nursing care and interpersonal skills to establish effective professional relationships.
sections: Class Nbr: 3849, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: T 4:30-5:30p; F 9a-12:30p, Instructor: Tanner/Haynes Ferere, Status: Open
